alert.note: Alert for Essex; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 3:10PM EST until December 31 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Little Falls affecting Passaic and Essex Counties. Passaic River Above Singac affecting Morris, Passaic and Essex Counties. Passaic River At Pine Brook affecting Morris, Passaic and Essex Counties. For the Passaic River...including Little Falls, Pine Brook, Singac... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Passaic River at Little Falls. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, The lower end of East-Holsman Street in Paterson, closest to the river, begins to flood. At 6.0 feet, Portions of Hoffman Grove in Wayne sustain some nuisance flooding. At 6.5 feet, Low lying areas in the vicinity of Two Bridges in Wayne are flooded. The lower end of Bergen Street in Paterson, closest to the river, begins to flood. At 7.0 feet, Minor flooding begins in Lincoln Park, Wayne and Little Falls. At 8.0 feet, Flooding occurs in the "Old" Wayne area of Wayne. The recycling center and Wagaraw Road ball field complex in Hawthorne begins to experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Saturday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:30 PM EST Saturday was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 5.5 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.3 feet on 03/23/2003. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Stg Time Date Passaic River Little Falls 7.0 7.4 Sat 2 pm 6.8 6.0 MSG unknown &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM EST.
